title: Lag spikes every 30 seconds or so.
body: Basically the title really. I'll join a game (I mainly play bots) and every 30 seconds or so my ping will go from a solid 40 to up over 600 then after a few seconds drop back down again. I have upnp enabled on my router so I shouldn't have to manually open the ports for the game though I can try that and see I suppose. Anyone else having the same issues? anyone have these issues and fix them? I'll all ears for suggestions. This is really making the game unplayable and unenjoyable for me. Those of you curious why I only play bots, its because I get super anxious and nervous rather easily, multi-play isn't good for my sanity at that point. xD

replies.body: It wouldn't hurt to make sure your settings are configured, and you can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically do that.  You could be having some packet loss or some network issue causing a weak connection to our game server.  Start out by going through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  Hopefully the instructions there will do the trick!

After using your repair tool not only did it not fix anything but it's completely locked me out of my router now, causes other only games to mass disconnect and fail to respond the only thing at this point that I can open internet based is a web browser.....I don't know what the hell that tool was supposed to do but now instead of making things better it's made them infinitely worse. Your game is not worth all the bs hoops I have to jump through to play it. Everytime I try to play this game I get some problem or other that crops up. Total frame skips for one....click around the map and it will actually skip frames even though I'm @ 150fps. It's always something with this game and this was the last straw.
